languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Ничего хорошего{/d}". {n}Сержант тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Мерзавцы эти во всех палят на улицах. Да и нашим отдан приказ открывать огонь без предупреждения. Передвигаться надо осторожно — мы, как отступали, еще улицы заминировали".

traits.locale_text: "Ничего хорошего". {n}Сержант тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Полоумные эти во всех палят на улицах. Да и наши ребята, какие еще остались, тоже малость нервные — открывают огонь без предупреждения. Передвигаться надо осторожно — мы, как отступали, еще улицы заминировали".

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Ничего хорошего{/d}". {n}Сержант тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Мерзавцы эти во всех палят на улицах. Да и нашим отдан приказ открывать огонь без предупреждения. Передвигаться надо осторожно — мы, как отступали, еще улицы заминировали".

traits.locale_text: "Nothing good." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bleeders shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

"Nothing good." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

"{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nichts Gutes{/d}." {n}Der Sergeant seufzt schwert.{/n} "Diese Bastarde erschießen jeden, der sich auf der Straße sehen lässt. Unsere eigenen Truppen haben Befehl, ohne Vorwarnung zu schießen. Ihr solltet vorsichtig sein, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Wir haben die Straßen bei unserem Rückzug auch noch vermint."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts Gutes." {n}Der Sergeant seufzt schwert.{/n} "Diese Bastarde erschießen jeden, der sich auf der Straße sehen lässt. Unsere eigenen Truppen haben Befehl, ohne Vorwarnung zu schießen. Ihr solltet vorsichtig sein, {mf|Sir|Madam}. Wir haben die Straßen bei unserem Rückzug auch noch vermint."

languages.text: « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Rien de bon{/d}, pour sûr, {n}répond le sergent en poussant un profond soupir.{/n} Dès que quelqu'un passe dans la rue, ces enfoirés l'allument. Du reste, nos troupes ont reçu l'ordre de tirer sans sommation, aussi devriez-vous vous montrer {mf|prudent|prudente}... Sans compter qu'on a miné les rues quand on a battu en retraite. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

traits.locale_text: « Rien de bon, pour sûr, {n}répond le sergent en poussant un profond soupir.{/n} Dès que quelqu'un passe dans la rue, ces enfoirés l'allument. Du reste, nos troupes ont reçu l'ordre de tirer sans sommation, aussi devriez-vous vous montrer {mf|prudent|prudente}... Sans compter qu'on a miné les rues quand on a battu en retraite. »

languages.text: “反正{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}不会是什么好东西{/d}。”{n}军士重重地叹了口气。{/n}“那些混蛋会射杀任何走在街上的人。我们自己的士兵也收到了命令，说只要见到人就不用警告，直接开火，长官。除此之外，我们在撤离的时候在街上埋了地雷。所以您最好多加小心，长官。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

traits.locale_text: “反正不会是什么好东西。”{n}军士重重地叹了口气。{/n}“那些混蛋会射杀任何走在街上的人。我们自己的士兵也收到了命令，说只要见到人就不用警告，直接开火，长官。除此之外，我们在撤离的时候在街上埋了地雷。所以您最好多加小心，长官。”

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}良くないことばかりです{/d}」{n}軍曹は深くため息をつく。{/n}「連中は通りを歩いている者がいれば撃ち殺します。我々部隊は警告せず発砲するよう命じられました。動く際はお気を付けください。それに加えて、撤退するときに通りを地雷で固めていますので」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

traits.locale_text: 「良くないことばかりです」{n}軍曹は深くため息をつく。{/n}「連中は通りを歩いている者がいれば撃ち殺します。我々部隊は警告せず発砲するよう命じられました。動く際はお気を付けください。他のこともそうですが、撤退するときに通りを地雷で固めていますので」

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nada bueno{/d}». {n}El sargento suspira con pesadez.{/n} «Esa gentuza disparará a cualquiera que camine por las calles. Nuestras propias tropas recibieron la orden de disparar sin previo aviso. Será mejor que se mueva con precaución, mi{mf|lord|lady}, también minamos las calles cuando nos retirábamos».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

traits.locale_text: «Nada bueno». {n}El sargento suspira profundamente.{/n} «Esos bastardos dispararán a cualquiera que camine por las calles. Nuestras propias tropas recibieron la orden de disparar sin previo aviso. Será mejor que se mueva con precaución, mi{mf|lord|lady}, también minamos las calles cuando nos retirábamos».

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}İyi şeyler değil{/d}." {n}Çavuş derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Piç herifler sokağa çıkan herkesi vuruyor. Askerlerimize de uyarmadan direkt ateş etmeleri emredildi. Dikkatli hareket etseniz iyi olur efendim. Bunlara ilaveten, geri çekilirken sokakları mayınladık."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}Nothing good{/d}." {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "Those bastards will shoot anyone walking the streets. Our own troops were ordered to fire without warning. You better move with caution, {mf|sir|ma'am} — on top of everything else, we mined the streets when we were pulling out."

traits.locale_text: "İyi şeyler değil." {n}Çavuş derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Piç herifler sokağa çıkan herkesi vuruyor. Askerlerimize de uyarmadan direkt ateş etmeleri emredildi. Dikkatli hareket etseniz iyi olur efendim. Bunlara ilaveten, geri çekilirken sokakları mayınladık."
